Articles.Content: You go to level 94, and you see several people on the same thread of the KSP RP Forum. Why they can\'t just talk to each other, I will never know.
you go to level 85 but landed on a shoot and must start from the beginning again.

Your insanity is wearing off (when did you become insane you ask, how can you possibly know?) and you realise you\'re still passed out on level 85 and can\'t remember what\'s going on. You\'re in some building and you start to head for the bottom. You press the elevator button and the door opens. There is no elevator in the shaft and you:

a) Fall in

Stumble back and trip over a banana skin

c) Leave calmly and follow the stairs to level 84

D) Become an outlaw and go up to floor 9001

Trip out a window, fall down to floor 84 and find a very angry cat.

You go to 85 and find that the room is dark.

There are cats everywhere.

Black cats with red glowing eyes.

Sitting on the floor, sitting on the furniture, some even sitting on the lamp.

They jump and attack you.

You are swarmed by evil cats and almost die.

You go to 85 and find that the room is dark.

There are cats everywhere.

Black cats with red glowing eyes.

Sitting on the floor, sitting on the furniture, some even sitting on the lamp.

They jump and attack you.

You are swarmed by evil cats and almost die.

Or did they...?

You go back to Croydon (Floor -3000) and meet bad fates...

You go to 87 and find a time machine.

You go back in time and tell yourself not to go to level 87.

You don\'t go back to level 87, so you never find the time machine and never stop yourself.

Because you never stop yourself, you to go level 87 and you find the time machine.

You go back in time and tell yourself not to go to level 87.

You don\'t go back to level 87, so you never find the time machine and never stop yourself.

Because you never stop yourself, you to go level 87 and you find the time machine.

You go back in time and tell yourself not to go to level 87.

You don\'t go back to level 87, so you never find the time machine and never stop yourself.

Because you never stop yourself, you to go level 87 and you find the time machine.

You go back in time and tell yourself not to go to level 87.

You don\'t go back to level 87, so you never find the time machine and never stop yourself.

Because you never stop yourself, you to go level 87 and you find the time machine.
You push the time machine out of the window and go down to the ground floor to see how it fared...

You get to ground floor and the time machine is running around zapping things. You get zapped and sent back in time to floor 87 after you pushed the time machine out of the window. You discover HarvesteR\'s secret workstation and in amazement you trip over another rake.

You go to 87 and find a time machine.

You go back in time and tell yourself not to go to level 87.

You don\'t go back to level 87, so you never find the time machine and never stop yourself.

Because you never stop yourself, you to go level 87 and you find the time machine.

You go back in time and tell yourself not to go to level 87.

You don\'t go back to level 87, so you never find the time machine and never stop yourself.

Because you never stop yourself, you to go level 87 and you find the time machine.

You go back in time and tell yourself not to go to level 87.

You don\'t go back to level 87, so you never find the time machine and never stop yourself.

Because you never stop yourself, you to go level 87 and you find the time machine.

You go back in time and tell yourself not to go to level 87.

You don\'t go back to level 87, so you never find the time machine and never stop yourself.

Because you never stop yourself, you to go level 87 and you find the time machine.

thats called the quatem therey

You travel up to Floor 88... wait... everything is fading out- *blacks out*

When you awaken, you\'re on Floor 38 back in the normal world with no memory of the posts after reply #52. The power is out, and you\'re looking up at a virtual reality machine. You wish you could use it, but the power\'s out. You can:

A)Go up one floor

B)Go down one floor

C)Wait for power to return

(believe it, I just wiped 108 posts off the map)

C)

While waiting for the power to resume, a chainsaw murderer walks in and attempts to assault you. What do you do?

Go back to Croydon - he would never go there!

(Uhh... Sorry if anyone\'s from Croydon...)
You find Croydon floor and you decide to climb to floor 40 (croydon appears to be on floor 89) and you find a Mac laptop. What do you do?

You throw it out of the window and see how it fares.

(Back to floor 0...)

The Mac is still working. It seems to be in quite a bad state, but you can see that the screen is still turned on. Then you realize someone just sellotaped a Mac screenshot onto the screen of a Windows computer and it is most definitely NOT working any longer. What next?

Go up to floor 82... And find something...

What, though?
A leprechaun greets you and is forcing you to pay a large sum of money to pass through his 'Golden Door' (which looks like wood)
You hit him on the head with the computer, thus knocking him out. You pass through the wooden 'gold' door and discover a world made entirely of candy.
You eat a piece and fall asleep drugged.
Go to 85 and.... Find yourself?

On floor 86...

Confused...?

You go to level 87...

Jeb is afraid for you

You go to level 88.

You find a sign saying \'go back now\'

You go to level 89...

You fall into a hole and falls back to level 87. And you made Jeb again afraid.
